summary: This simple mod will give you a Dragon Priest Dagger.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod will allow you to get a Dragon Priest Dagger. I know it isn\'t the best dagger in the game but it still looks badass.To install place the txt. file in Skyrim where the Data folder is located (Not in the data folder or Skyrim>Skyrim)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To get it open up the console and type in \"bat priestdag\".
author: Flash68
